channel.title: Is it possible
channel.description:
to make a command for like mods and admins, to barrage someone and tb same time?
also sometimes for no reason ill freeze up on silab client.. is it just her client or what?

item.title: Is it possible
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

yes what i would do would be to try combine your tb spell and barrage spell get rid of the runes and start it out like

[code]if (command.EqualsIgnoreCase(“barrage”) && playerRights >= 2) {
(add tb and barrage spell codes)

[/code]
just edit out whatever cases you have when you c+p it in keep in the gfx animation and attacking thingy

Read full topic
